headline: Hagens Berman: Consumer Lawsuit Alleges Widespread Deforestation Behind Charmin Toilet Paper’s Greenwashed Facade
summary: Class-action lawsuit accuses Charmin parent company, Procter & Gamble Co., of misleading the public and preying on consumers’ desire to protect the environment...
